about.title: About ECM Digital
about.subtitle: Team of AI experts who transform business through intelligent solutions
about.description1: We are a team of technology enthusiasts who believe that every business deserves digital transformation. We combine creativity with innovative technological solutions.
about.description2: ECM Digital is a brand offering comprehensive and modern digital solutions. We specialize in web design, e-commerce, UX audits, and business process automation, helping companies develop in the digital world.
about.description3: The ECM Digital brand operates within Scrum Software Sp. z o.o., which is the formal owner of all services we provide and the legally responsible entity. It is Scrum Software Sp. z o.o. that issues invoices, enters into contracts, and handles financial settlements.
about.description4: Thanks to this solution, we combine modern branding with professional legal service, ensuring our clients full security and transparency of cooperation.
about.mission.description: We democratize access to AI, helping companies of all sizes leverage the potential of artificial intelligence for business growth.
about.vision.description: To be a leader in digital transformation in Poland, creating AI solutions that actually increase efficiency and revenue.
about.values.description: Innovation, transparency and results. We implement every project with passion, delivering measurable business benefits.

chatbot.title: ECM Digital Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Tomasz Gnat - Discovery Consultant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm the ECM Digital digital assistant. I can tell you about our services, help you choose a solution or arrange a consultation. How can I help you?

suggestions.pricing: How much do your services cost?
suggestions.consultation: I want to arrange a consultation
suggestions.aiAssistants: Tell me about your AI assistants
suggestions.automation: How do you automate business processes?

responses.services: We offer comprehensive digital services: Websites from 3,500 PLN, Shopify stores from 8,000 PLN, Mobile apps from 15,000 PLN, AI assistants on Amazon Bedrock, Automations with n8n/Zapier/Opal, UX audits and Social Media with AI. Which service interests you most?
responses.pricing: Our prices start from: Websites - 3,500 PLN, Shopify stores - 8,000 PLN, Mobile apps - 15,000 PLN, AI assistants - 12,000 PLN. All prices are individual and depend on project complexity. Would you like to receive an exact quote?
responses.consultation: Great! I can arrange a free consultation with our team. Provide your phone number or email, and we'll contact you within 24 hours. When would you be available?
responses.portfolio: We have a rich project portfolio: Websites for companies from various industries, Shopify stores with high conversion, Mobile apps for startups, AI assistants for corporations. Would you like to see specific examples?
responses.aiAssistants: We specialize in AI! We create assistants on Amazon Bedrock (Claude, Titan, Llama), Copilot Studio for Microsoft 365, voice chatbots on Amazon Lex. AI can automate your business processes. Would you like to learn more?
responses.automation: We automate business processes using n8n, Zapier and Opal. We can automate: marketing, sales, HR, finance, customer service. This saves time and reduces errors. Which processes would you like to automate?
responses.default: Thank you for your question! I can tell you about our services, prices, arrange a consultation or show portfolio. What interests you most?
